title: Crowned Heads
description: Thomas Tryon brings to breathtaking life the Golden Age of Hollywood and the great golden people who became the crowned heads of this kingdom of starsFEDORA: Her enigma unriddled--the greatest, the most exquisite, the longest-reigning Hollywood star of them all. Now she has made an incredible comeback, her glorious face strangely untouched by time....LORNA: She zoomed from high school cheerleader to sex goddess. Now after many men, many jobs, and much trouble, she has come to a remote Mexican resort to find herself....BOBBITT: He was a star at ten. Now he's in his thirties and as winsome as ever. But today the Bobbitt movies are forgotten. And Bobbitt himself--does he exist at all?WILLIE: For decades a worldwide symbol of elegance and wit. Now he is alone in his showplace Hollywood villa--his precious "Bee" dead--morning the past. Then suddenly, viciously, with a knock on the door, the future breaks in....
author: Thomas Tryon
